availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, attorney. Kentucky, native. Married to Jennie M. Watson Coke. Father of James Guthrie Coke, Jr.

bibl.p:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, Ward 4, p. 78. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, Ward 7, p. 81.
Kentucky, County Marriages, 1783-1965, Ancestry, Todd County, 1865. Find A Grave, "James Guthrie Coke (1841-1905)," Memorial #82500709, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=82500709&ref=acom (accessed July, 7, 2017).
